Laredo.The Outlet Shoppes at Laredo: The Outlet Shoppes at Laredo is an outlet mall in downtown Laredo, Texas. It was originally a regional 385,000-square-foot (35,800 m2) indoor mall located in the north Rio Grande bank in downtown Laredo, Texas. River Drive Mall was Laredo's main mall from 1970 to the mid 1980s.
